DOC.brief_summary: This study consist fill questionnaire possible erectile dysfunction .
DOC.detailed_description: Male diabetic patient attend diabetic routine year program visit ask give voluntary permission fill questionnaire possible erectile dysfunction . The questionnaire consist two part : Part 1 IIEF ( International Index Erectile Function ) questionnaire Part 2 additional questionnaire . The included patient fill questionnaire two time ; begin diabetic year program visit second time one year later next diabetic year program consultation . The patient also ask give permission use result routine diabetic year program scientific research .
DOC.criteria: Male diabetic patient Age old 18 year
